title: Symantec NetBackup Client and OpsCenter v7.7.1 [deepstatus]
description:
Symantec NetBackup Client and OpsCenter v7.7.1 [deepstatus]

URL.......: https://www.symantec.com/netbackup/





Please take a moment and read:
 
https://stop-ttip.org/sign/


Thank you for your time!!!

Transform Backup to Transform your Business - The future of enterprise-class data protection is here. Symantec NetBackup 7.7 reduces the staggering complexity of enterprise data protection, outpaces the relentless growth of the data center, and increases the agility IT needs to transform from traditional cost center to service-oriented business enabler. Enterprises trust Symantec.

New Features:
â€¢ Expanded support for cloud storage providers, including Google Nearline, HDS, and Cloudian.
â€¢ Enhanced cloud backup and restore performance.
â€¢ VMware vSphere web client and Microsoft SCVMM plug-ins.
â€¢ Intelligent Policies for Hyper-V and SQL Server.
â€¢ Audit Controls/FIPS Compliance.
â€¢ Support for NetApp Clustered Data ONTAP (cDOT).
â€¢ NetBackup Self Service enhancements.

Key Features:
â€¢ Converged backup platform integrates software and hardware to create a solution that is extremely easy to deploy and maintain.
â€¢ Extensive integration with virtual and physical systems, applications, and storage technologies enable almost any enterprise environment to be protected using a single solution.
â€¢ Accelerator reduces backup times from hours to minutes by limiting backups to changed blocks and combining them with previous backup data to produce synthetic full backups.
â€¢ Auto Image Replication automates the process of moving data to another site for disaster recovery, merging data from multiple sources and synchronizing catalog information to speed recovery.
â€¢ Replication Director orchestrates hardware snapshot and replication operations from leading providers such as NetApp and EMC, ensures snapshots are application-consistent, and catalogs snapshots for easy file restore.

Key Benefits:
â€¢ Dramatically simplify enterprise data protection by eliminating point products and trivializing infrastructure management.
â€¢ Keep pace with massive numbers of systems and growing data volumes.
â€¢ Easily manage, replicate, and retain copy data according to preset policies.
â€¢ Quickly recover from any backup storage, including snapshots and deduplicated disk, with easy granular restore of any files or objects by simple checkbox selection from an intuitive interface.
â€¢ Manage a large enterprise environment with limited staff and resources.

What's new in version 7.7.1:
â€¢ Descriptions of new features and enhancements
â€¢ Installation information and updated binary sizes for supported platforms
â€¢ Required patches
â€¢ Operational notes and known issues




[INSTALLATION]



1) Unrar

2) Install (run DVD browser.exe)

3) Choose to install as Client Software,
which is what you need for PC and Workstation.
(Untested with Server Software)


â€¢ Thats it! Done.
